tool_description: Search All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info with this api ,search once and get list of all cars. use it for auto-suggestion
name: All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info
title: All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info
tool_name: All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info

api_list.name: fetch images
api_list.description: pass the image field you get for each car from fetch all cars api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-cars-names-image-and-variants-info.p.rapidapi.com/vehicles/Audi/audi_r8_coupe/Ibis_white.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-cars-names-image-and-variants-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-cars-names-image-and-variants-info.p.rapidapi.com/{imageurl}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-cars-names-image-and-variants-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search All Cars

This API will fetch you all cars list, 
If you need bike details change **vehicle_type** from "car" to "bike".
